metadata.synopsis: The player enters the camp, and Mizora is waiting with three cronies. She makes a pact with Wyll: Pact with Mizora and save his father, or refuse and ensure his death.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk with Mizora on Wyrm's Crossing bridge to Lower city after experiencing Gortash scene, then go to camp

4.speaker: Mizora
4.text: Sorores surge. Testis esto pacti mei.
4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll enters camp. A diabolical circle draws itself onto the ground in front of Wyll, and Mizora in devil form rises from it.

161.speaker: Mizora
161.text: Sorores surge. Testis esto pacti mei.
161.context: NodeContext: Latin: Sisters, rise and be witness to my bargain! Said with great power, as she is summoning devils from the hells. (so-RO-res SOOR-ge. TES-tiss ESS-toh PAK-tee MEY.)

189.text: *You've heard of such devils - Sisters of Justice, adjudicators of diabolical contracts and bargains.*
189.context: CinematicNodeContext: Two more diabolical circles form, and a female devil rises from each.

100.speaker: Wyll
100.text: *You've heard of such devils - Sisters of Justice, adjudicators of diabolical contracts and bargains.*
100.context: NodeContext: Chorus line. Two sisters need to speak in tandem. (in-FER-noos kon-TRAK-toos te vo-KA-moos [all "oo" sounds short, like the "u" in "put"])

192.speaker: Narrator
192.text: *You've heard of such devils - Sisters of Justice, adjudicators of diabolical contracts and bargains.*
192.context: NodeContext: Chorus line. Two sisters need to speak in tandem. (in-FER-noos kon-TRAK-toos te vo-KA-moos [all "oo" sounds short, like the "u" in "put"])

168.speaker: Narrator
168.text: *You've heard of such devils - Sisters of Justice, adjudicators of diabolical contracts and bargains.*

130.context: NodeContext: Chorus line. Two sisters need to speak in tandem. (in-FER-noos kon-TRAK-toos te vo-KA-moos [all "oo" sounds short, like the "u" in "put"])

24.speaker: Narrator
24.context: NodeContext: Chorus line. Two sisters need to speak in tandem. (in-FER-noos kon-TRAK-toos te vo-KA-moos [all "oo" sounds short, like the "u" in "put"])

151.speaker: Karlach
151.context: NodeContext: Chorus line. Two sisters need to speak in tandem. (in-FER-noos kon-TRAK-toos te vo-KA-moos [all "oo" sounds short, like the "u" in "put"])

159.speaker: Wyll
159.text: What are you up to, Mizora?
159.context: NodeContext: Chorus line. Two sisters need to speak in tandem. (in-FER-noos kon-TRAK-toos te vo-KA-moos [all "oo" sounds short, like the "u" in "put"])

89.speaker: Wyll
89.text: Interesting. I don't recall sending out invitations to the Sisters of Justice.
89.context: NodeContext: Chorus line. Two sisters need to speak in tandem. (in-FER-noos kon-TRAK-toos te vo-KA-moos [all "oo" sounds short, like the "u" in "put"])

73.speaker: Mizora
73.text: You do not call upon the Sisters. They come when the Hells demand witness.

87.speaker: Wyll
87.text: Please, introduce me to your friends.
87.context: NodeContext: Chorus line. Two sisters need to speak in tandem. (in-FER-noos kon-TRAK-toos te vo-KA-moos [all "oo" sounds short, like the "u" in "put"])

82.speaker: Wyll
82.text: Enough games - they took my father. Now what?
82.context: NodeContext: Chorus line. Two sisters need to speak in tandem. (in-FER-noos kon-TRAK-toos te vo-KA-moos [all "oo" sounds short, like the "u" in "put"])

107.speaker: Wyll
107.text: Enough games - my father is dead. There must be something you can do.
107.context: NodeContext: Chorus line. Two sisters need to speak in tandem. (in-FER-noos kon-TRAK-toos te vo-KA-moos [all "oo" sounds short, like the "u" in "put"])

110.speaker: Wyll
110.text: Gods, you have the worst timing.
110.context: NodeContext: Chorus line. Two sisters need to speak in tandem. (in-FER-noos kon-TRAK-toos te vo-KA-moos [all "oo" sounds short, like the "u" in "put"])

190.speaker: Mizora
190.text: Do you suppose? I'd call the timing most perfect, myself.
190.context: NodeContext: Chorus line. Two sisters need to speak in tandem. (in-FER-noos kon-TRAK-toos te vo-KA-moos [all "oo" sounds short, like the "u" in "put"])

65.speaker: Mizora
65.text: I come to bargain. The Hells demand witness.
65.context: NodeContext: Chorus line. Two sisters need to speak in tandem. (in-FER-noos kon-TRAK-toos te vo-KA-moos [all "oo" sounds short, like the "u" in "put"])

17.speaker: Mizora
17.text: Your father is dead, Wyll. The Dead Three have claimed their prize.
17.context: NodeContext: Chorus line. Two sisters need to speak in tandem. (in-FER-noos kon-TRAK-toos te vo-KA-moos [all "oo" sounds short, like the "u" in "put"])

166.speaker: Mizora
166.text: Your father is dead, Wyll. The Dead Three have claimed their prize.
166.context: NodeContext: Chorus line. Two sisters need to speak in tandem. (in-FER-noos kon-TRAK-toos te vo-KA-moos [all "oo" sounds short, like the "u" in "put"])

157.speaker: Wyll
157.text: It can't be. I don't believe you.
157.context: NodeContext: Chorus line. Two sisters need to speak in tandem. (in-FER-noos kon-TRAK-toos te vo-KA-moos [all "oo" sounds short, like the "u" in "put"])

40.speaker: Mizora
40.text: I've no reason to lie. He's gone - for good, some might say. But not every death is forever.

191.speaker: Wyll
191.text: Shit. What did you do, Mizora?
191.context: NodeContext: Chorus line. Two sisters need to speak in tandem. (in-FER-noos kon-TRAK-toos te vo-KA-moos [all "oo" sounds short, like the "u" in "put"])

1.speaker: Mizora
1.text: I had no hand in your father's death, Wyll. But that doesn't mean he might not still live.
1.context: NodeContext: Chorus line. Two sisters need to speak in tandem. (in-FER-noos kon-TRAK-toos te vo-KA-moos [all "oo" sounds short, like the "u" in "put"])

123.speaker: Arbiter Cirrus
123.text: Infernus contractus te vocamus. Infernus contractus te vocamus. Infernus contractus te vocamus.
123.context: NodeContext: Chorus line. Two sisters need to speak in tandem. (in-FER-noos kon-TRAK-toos te vo-KA-moos [all "oo" sounds short, like the "u" in "put"])

20.context: CinematicNodeContext: A contract appears in the air, glowing. It is Wyll's contract.

115.speaker: Wyll
115.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flames ignite Mizora and her two companions. Mizora's voice echos outward as if amplified by the Hells themselves.

149.speaker: Wyll
149.text: Then break it already. I suffered enough.
149.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flames ignite Mizora and her two companions. Mizora's voice echos outward as if amplified by the Hells themselves.

53.speaker: Wyll
53.text: Then break it now, Mizora. I don't need to wait six months.
53.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flames ignite Mizora and her two companions. Mizora's voice echos outward as if amplified by the Hells themselves.

175.speaker: Wyll
175.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flames ignite Mizora and her two companions. Mizora's voice echos outward as if amplified by the Hells themselves.

141.text: Option one. I show you the way to your father. I guarantee him no harm except that from you and your allies. And you pledge your soul to me and the archdevil Zariel in a pact eternal.
141.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flames ignite Mizora and her two companions. Mizora's voice echos outward as if amplified by the Hells themselves.

93.speaker: Mizora
93.text: Option one. I show you the way to your father. I guarantee him no harm except that from you and your allies. And you pledge your soul to me and the archdevil Zariel in a pact eternal.
93.context: CinematicNodeContext: The contract glows with fire. (Alternate: If possible, a quill appears and scralws across the contract first)

83.speaker: Mizora
83.context: CinematicNodeContext: The contract glows with fire. (Alternate: If possible, a quill appears and scralws across the contract first)

185.speaker: Wyll
185.text: What happens to my powers if I break the pact?
185.context: CinematicNodeContext: The contract glows with fire. (Alternate: If possible, a quill appears and scralws across the contract first)

195.speaker: Wyll
195.text: I won't let you take my father. He's Baldur's Gate's best hope.
195.context: CinematicNodeContext: The contract glows with fire. (Alternate: If possible, a quill appears and scralws across the contract first)

152.speaker: Wyll
152.text: Bring back my father. He's Baldur's Gate's best hope.
152.context: CinematicNodeContext: The contract glows with fire. (Alternate: If possible, a quill appears and scralws across the contract first)

76.speaker: Wyll
76.text: I'm the Blade of Frontiers, godsdammit. Take my soul, not his.
76.context: CinematicNodeContext: The contract glows with fire. (Alternate: If possible, a quill appears and scralws across the contract first)

38.speaker: Mizora
38.text: You always were your father's son.
38.context: CinematicNodeContext: The contract glows with fire. (Alternate: If possible, a quill appears and scralws across the contract first)

135.text: *Your mind connects to the Grand Duke's. He is still infected, but his parasite is weak, shielded from the Absolute by the Astral Prism.*
135.context: CinematicNodeContext: The contract glows with fire. (Alternate: If possible, a quill appears and scralws across the contract first)

124.text: *Your mind connects to the Grand Duke's. He is still infected, but his parasite is weak, shielded from the Absolute by the Astral Prism.*
124.context: CinematicNodeContext: The fire disspears around Mizora and the devils. A diabolical circle appears under the two sisters, and they sink through. The contract disappears with them.

5.text: *Your mind connects to the Grand Duke's. He is still infected, but his parasite is weak, shielded from the Absolute by the Astral Prism.*
5.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora waves her arms and another diabolical circle is drawn on the ground. Duke Ravengard rises from it, confused. The circle beneath him dissipates.

193.speaker: Narrator
193.text: *Your mind connects to the Grand Duke's. He is still infected, but his parasite is weak, shielded from the Absolute by the Astral Prism.*

122.speaker: Wyll
122.text: Break the pact. I will have my freedom.

172.speaker: Wyll
172.text: Let my father die. When the city's free, I'll take his place.

50.speaker: Wyll
50.text: Take my father's soul. When the city's free, I will take his place.

187.speaker: Mizora
187.text: So much for the selfless hero.

8.speaker: Mizora
8.text: Option one. I raise your father from the dead. And you pledge your soul to me and the archdevil Zariel in a pact eternal.

137.speaker: Wyll
137.text: Let them have him, then. He was never any use to me.

116.speaker: Mizora
116.text: You say that. But minds can change in the span of a snap - and not every death is forever.

36.speaker: Mizora
36.text: Sorores surge. Testis esto pacti mei.

91.speaker: Mizora
91.text: Sorores surge. Testis esto pacti mei.

134.text: Sorores surge. Testis esto pacti mei.
134.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player enters the camp, Wyll waiting at a side, fully in view. A diabolical circle draws itself onto the ground in front of you and Wyll, shocked/surprise, and Mizora in devil form rises from it, maybe can have a turn and a noble pose at the end.

42.speaker: Mizora
42.text: Sorores surge. Testis esto pacti mei.
42.context: NodeContext: Latin: Sisters, rise and be witness to my bargain! Said with great power, as she is summoning devils from the hells. (so-RO-res SOOR-ge. TES-tiss ESS-toh PAK-tee MEY.)

163.text: Come, Sisters, be my testament. Notum sit in Baator.
163.context: CinematicNodeContext: Two more diabolical circles form, and a female devil rises from each.

103.speaker: Mizora
103.text: Come, Sisters, be my testament. Notum sit in Baator.

118.speaker: Arbiter Cirrus
118.context: NodeContext: Chorus line. Two sisters need to speak in tandem. "NO-toom SIT IN bay-AH-tohr."

146.speaker: Player
146.text: *You've heard of such devils - Sisters of Justice, adjudicators of diabolical contracts and bargains.*
146.context: NodeContext: In awe - half frightened, half confident.

64.speaker: Wyll
64.text: *You've heard of such devils - Sisters of Justice, adjudicators of diabolical contracts and bargains.*
64.context: NodeContext: In awe - half frightened, half confident.

176.speaker: Narrator
176.text: *You've heard of such devils - Sisters of Justice, adjudicators of diabolical contracts and bargains.*

47.context: NodeContext: In awe - half frightened, half confident.

109.speaker: Wyll
109.context: NodeContext: In awe - half frightened, half confident.

164.speaker: Player
164.text: Just what are you up to?

56.speaker: Mizora
56.text: I come to bargain. The Hells demand witness.

106.speaker: Mizora
106.text: Your father is dead, Wyll. The Dead Three have claimed their prize.

158.speaker: Mizora
158.text: Your father is dead, Wyll. The Dead Three have claimed their prize.

19.speaker: Mizora
19.text: Your father is dead, Wyll. The Dead Three have claimed their prize.

112.speaker: Mizora
112.text: Still yourself, pup. Not every death is forever.

169.speaker: Mizora
169.text: *Your parasite links with Wyll's, and your memories flow into him. He sees his father's flight from Wyrm's Rock and hears Mizora's words to you.*

184.speaker: Narrator
184.text: *Your parasite links with Wyll's, and your memories flow into him. He sees his father's flight from Wyrm's Rock and hears Mizora's words to you.*

69.speaker: Wyll
69.text: Enough, Mizora. My father is dead. Say your piece.
69.context: NodeContext: Chorus line. Two sisters need to speak in tandem. (in-FER-noos kon-TRAK-toos te vo-KA-moos [all "oo" sounds short, like the "u" in "put"])

52.speaker: Mizora
52.context: NodeContext: Chorus line. Two sisters need to speak in tandem. (in-FER-noos kon-TRAK-toos te vo-KA-moos [all "oo" sounds short, like the "u" in "put"])

114.context: NodeContext: Chorus line. Two sisters need to speak in tandem. (in-FER-noos kon-TRAK-toos te vo-KA-moos [all "oo" sounds short, like the "u" in "put"])

3.text: Your contract, Wyll. Signed in blood, forged in fire, bound in bone - but not unbreakable.
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: A contract appears in the air, glowing. It is Wyll's contract.

74.speaker: Mizora
74.text: Your contract, Wyll. Signed in blood, forged in fire, bound in bone - but not unbreakable.
74.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flames ignite Mizora and her two companions. Mizora's voice echos outward as if amplified by the Hells themselves.

30.speaker: Player
30.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flames ignite Mizora and her two companions. Mizora's voice echos outward as if amplified by the Hells themselves.

182.speaker: Mizora
182.text: A life for a life. No contract is ended without sacrifice. The cost must be paid.

197.speaker: Player
197.text: Then break it already. Wyll has suffered enough.
197.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flames ignite Mizora and her two companions. Mizora's voice echos outward as if amplified by the Hells themselves.

138.speaker: Player
138.text: Then break it already. Wyll doesn't need to wait six months.
138.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flames ignite Mizora and her two companions. Mizora's voice echos outward as if amplified by the Hells themselves.

145.speaker: Mizora
145.text: No contract is ended without sacrifice. A cost must be paid.

104.speaker: Player
104.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flames ignite Mizora and her two companions. Mizora's voice echos outward as if amplified by the Hells themselves.

96.speaker: Mizora
96.text: Yet no contract is ended without sacrifice, Wyll. The cost must be paid.
96.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flames ignite Mizora and her two companions. Mizora's voice echos outward as if amplified by the Hells themselves.

55.text: Wyll Ravengard. A choice is before you.
55.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flames ignite Mizora and her two companions. Mizora's voice echos outward as if amplified by the Hells themselves.

80.text: Wyll Ravengard. A choice is before you.

155.speaker: Mizora
155.text: Wyll Ravengard. A choice is before you.

72.speaker: Mizora
72.text: Option one. I show you the way to your father. I guarantee him no harm except that from you and your allies. And you pledge your soul to me and the archdevil Zariel in a pact eternal.

180.speaker: Mizora
180.text: Option two. I break your pact. You are freed from your duty but retain your devil form. Your father dies by his enemy's hand.

177.speaker: Mizora
177.text: Option two. I break your pact, and you are freed from your duty. Your father dies by his enemy's hand, and Baldur's Gate loses its greatest champion.

44.speaker: Mizora
44.text: Option one. I raise your father from the dead. And you pledge your soul to me and the archdevil Zariel in a pact eternal.

97.speaker: Mizora
97.text: Option two. I break your pact, and you are freed from your duty. Your father remains dead, and Baldur's Gate loses its greatest champion.

143.speaker: Narrator
143.text: Bloody Zariel. I won't let her take Wyll!

81.speaker: Karlach
81.text: Bloody Zariel. I won't let her take Wyll!

35.speaker: Player
35.text: What will happen to Wyll's powers if he breaks the pact?

120.speaker: Mizora
120.text: Addendum F. 'The Absolute must be avenged for the soul-binder's detention at Moonrise. The soul-bearer retains his gifts until such time as the Absolute is slain.'

200.speaker: Player
200.text: Save your father, Wyll. The city will need him to help rebuild.

11.speaker: Player
11.text: Bring back your father, Wyll. The city will need him to help rebuild.

147.speaker: Wyll
147.text: Do it, then. Claim my soul for Zariel. Keep my father safe.
147.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll pauses, walk towards Mizora  then speaksNodeContext: Angry but resigned

105.speaker: Wyll
105.text: Do it, then. Claim my soul for Zariel. Bring my father back.
105.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll pauses, walk towards Mizora  then speaksNodeContext: Angry but resigned

153.speaker: Arbiter Cirrus
153.context: CinematicNodeContext: The contract glows with fire. (Alternate: If possible, a quill appears and scralws across the contract first)

132.text: *Your mind connects to the Grand Duke's. He is still infected, but his parasite is weak, shielded from the Absolute by the Astral Prism.*
132.context: CinematicNodeContext: The contract glows with fire. (Alternate: If possible, a quill appears and scralws across the contract first)

99.text: *Your mind connects to the Grand Duke's. He is still infected, but his parasite is weak, shielded from the Absolute by the Astral Prism.*
99.context: CinematicNodeContext: The fire disspears around Mizora and the devils. A diabolical circle appears under the two sisters, and they sink through. The contract disappears with them.

0.text: *Your mind connects to the Grand Duke's. He is still infected, but his parasite is weak, shielded from the Absolute by the Astral Prism.*
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora waves her arms and another diabolical circle is drawn on the ground. Duke Ravengard rises from it, confused. The circle beneath him dissipates.

178.speaker: Mizora
178.text: *Your mind connects to the Grand Duke's. He is still infected, but his parasite is weak, shielded from the Absolute by the Astral Prism.*
178.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora waves her arms and another diabolical circle is drawn on the ground. Duke Ravengard rises from it, confused. The circle beneath him dissipates.

54.speaker: Narrator
54.text: *Your mind connects to the Grand Duke's. He is still infected, but his parasite is weak, shielded from the Absolute by the Astral Prism.*

9.speaker: Duke Ulder Ravengard
9.text: What - what's happened? Wyll. Is that you?

23.speaker: Wyll
23.text: It's me, father. It's all right. You're safe here.
23.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll and Ravengard walk towards each other, then started gesturing talking. After Mizora done delivering her lines, she will look around and then smiles evily and continue the next node.

78.speaker: Mizora
78.text: A promise made, a promise kept.
78.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll and Ravengard walk towards each other, then started gesturing talking. After Mizora done delivering her lines, she will look around and then smiles evily and continue the next node.

142.speaker: Mizora
142.text: I'll let you two catch up - I'm sure you've got plenty to talk about.
142.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll and Ravengard walk towards each other, then started gesturing talking. After Mizora done delivering her lines, she will look around and then smiles evily and continue the next node.

71.speaker: Mizora
71.text: You know, I think I'll stick around, watch this play out. I could use the entertainment.

90.speaker: Mizora
90.text: Seems you've got a new mission, pup: go save your father.

165.speaker: Mizora
165.text: He's locked in a very nasty place - Gortash's secret command centre and prison.

102.speaker: Mizora
102.text: Lucky for you, I know the way in. I'll mark your map - after all, a deal's a deal.

34.speaker: Player
34.text: Do the right thing. Give your soul so that your father can live.
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll pauses, then nods at the beginning of the lines.

70.speaker: Player
70.text: Break the pact, Wyll. You deserve your freedom.
70.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll pauses, then nods at the beginning of the lines.

37.speaker: Wyll
37.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll pauses, then nods at the beginning of the lines.

199.speaker: Wyll
199.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll pauses, then nods at the beginning of the lines.

160.text: Didn't think you had it in you. Seems my boy's all grown up.
160.context: CinematicNodeContext: The contract is destroyed. Either it burns and turns to ash where it floats, or it is ripped in two first, and then turns to ash.

68.text: Didn't think you had it in you. Seems my boy's all grown up.
68.context: CinematicNodeContext: The fire disspears around Mizora and the devils. A diabolical circle appears under the two sisters, and they sink through.

79.speaker: Mizora
79.text: Didn't think you had it in you. Seems my boy's all grown up.
79.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora Looks around her, and smiles evilly.

85.speaker: Mizora
85.text: And don't go fussing about your father. You made your choice, you knew the terms.
85.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora Looks around her, and smiles evilly.

150.speaker: Mizora
150.text: You know what? I think I'll stick around.
150.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora Looks around her, and smiles evilly.

21.speaker: Mizora
21.text: Not for the greater good, you understand. Just for the entertainment.

194.speaker: Player
194.text: Let your father die. When the city's free, you can take his place.

183.speaker: Player
183.text: Leave him dead. When the city's free, you can take his place.

84.speaker: Wyll
84.text: Father is dead? Godsdamned devil. Why are you here?

167.speaker: Wyll
167.text: Enough, Mizora. Where is my father? How do I save him?

133.speaker: Wyll
133.text: Shit. Where did Gortash send my father? How do I save him?

66.speaker: Player
66.text: Interesting. I don't recall sending out invitations to the Sisters of Justice.

12.speaker: Mizora
12.text: You do not call upon the Sisters. They come when the Hells demand witness.

41.speaker: Player
41.text: Please, introduce me to your friends.

46.speaker: Mizora
46.text: Feena, Cirrus. Arbiters for the Hells, exemplars of justice.

140.speaker: Player
140.text: The Duke's been taken. Now what?

119.speaker: Player
119.text: Get on with it, Mizora. What can you do about Ravengard?

188.speaker: Player
188.text: I thought we were done with you.

101.speaker: Mizora
101.text: I am not so easy to be rid of. I come to bargain, and the Hells demand witness.

25.speaker: Player
25.text: Come to gloat, Mizora? We found a letter claiming Ravengard died.

144.speaker: Player
144.text: Come to gloat, Mizora? We saw Ravengard's corpse for ourselves.
